New Delhi : Tehelka founder editor Tarun Tejpal , who is behind the bars in a rape case , on Monday sought from the Supreme Court his release to enable him to attend the cremation of his mother who died in Goa on Sunday .
Appearing before a bench of justices BS Chauhan and AK Sikri , advocate Sandeep Kapur mentioned the matter seeking its direction to release him to attend the cremation of his mother .
